content:
I had this as reverse.
I saw it was something to do with radices, but in 15 minutes I didn't figure anything out. I didn't type a single keystroke.
5 tests is not enough for something like this. The first two examples are completely different from the others.
I also submitted a reverse clash using radices, with modulo, easier to spot than this, and with far more tests, and got a slew of downvotes.
I would have enjoyed the challenge in fastest mode.
In reverse, I have to admit that I lost interest the second I saw the capital letters.
Thank you for your comments: I added the fastest and shortest modes and I approve the 5th test.
Ok, looks like it's too hard on practice. Can you add more tests? Something in between of test 2 and 3

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Works nicely, love the idea

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's going to be a nice clash. I also agree that fastest and shortest would be good as well.
I liked this one, but would be great as a shortest and fastest too

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Stub is not the best but otherwise really good.
I would also like to see it in the shortest and fastest
